history.note: Lowercase letter hashmap for optimized O(1) space solution, sort solution for completely O(1) space
Hashmap solution, two pointer with sorting wont work here because this problem needs the indices - sorting destorys the indices. However if the problem just needs a smple yes / no then its possible
O(M * N) Time- M is length of strs array, N is length of shortest prefix

Sorting solution using STL - time would be O(N * K Log K) - where N is length of strs array, K is length each of individual string. Optimization is using counting sort to sacrifice space for linear sort time
STL usage of remove_if and remove
Sort to have a O(n log n) solution, but true O(n) time solution is by using a set
history.mistake: Couldn't immediately grasp the logic for the set based solution ; understood the sort one only

history.note: Simple array concatenation, append nums to itself
HashSet for O(n) solution time and space, sort for O(1) space solution
